name: University of Adventure: Tiko's Tail
description:
University of Adventure: Tiko's Tail is a metroidvania set in a school with sinister secrets in its depths. Will you pass the entrance exam?

(Challenge Build)

Check out the game in the Windows Store:  https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/tikos-tail/9nvbwg8qtkxp?activetab=pivot:overvi...
